name: makeup-dialog
description: Abstract class representing the base behaviour for a modal or non-modal ARIA dialog
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.compile: npm run compile:mjs && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.compile:cjs: babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs src/index.js --out-file dist/cjs/index.js && babel --plugins @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs src/transition.js --out-file dist/cjs/transition.js
